summary: Adds 4 Jormungandr (snake) swords with cool special effects.
descriptionHtml:
Hello Dovahkiins :D

The Dovahkiin love snakes. He likes them as bags, shoes… but now he got a new idea, to make snake weapons :)

This mod gives you 4 snake like swords with special effects. All swords are improvable and smithable under the dragon section. They are pre-enchanted with poison, fire, frost and shock, but the enchantment can be removed at the tanning rack, so it\'s possible to re-enchant them like you want.

-----------------------------------
-----------------------------------

Mythology:

In the Norse mythology, J?rmungandr  is a sea serpent, the middle child of the giantess Angrboða and the god Loki. The serpent grew so large that he was able to surround the earth and grasp his own tail. When he lets go, the world will end.

What mean the names:

The enchanted swords are full in Old Norse (Viking). On the un-enchanted swords I used names of snake families (Colubridae, Elapidae, Pythonidae and Viperidae).
Old Norse translation:
Eitr - Poison
Eldr - Fire
Frjosa - Frost
Prymja - Thunder

-----------------------------------
-----------------------------------

Installing:
Use the Nexus Mod Manager or extract the files to your Skyrim/Data folder and select it in the Skyrim launcher.

Uninstalling:
You can uninstall it like any other mod, via the nexus mod manager or by deleting the two mod related files.

-----------------------------------
-----------------------------------

If you like weapons with special effects, try my other mod „The Elementals“ too:
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/18072

Wish much fun and greetings from Slovakia :D
Tom (Space Wiking)
author: SpaceWiking
